Writer: Fred Wolf (story), Harris Goldberg (story), Tom Nursall (story), Jay Leggett (screenplay), Mitch Rouse (screenplay)
Title: Without a Paddle
Actors: Matthew Price, Andrew Hampton, Jarred Rumbold, Carl Snell
Plot: After their friend dies, three men decide to fulfill their childhood dream by going on a camping expedition for the lost D. B. Cooper bounty, with calamitous results.
